misc: Has planted his seeds in four different women in four different decades.
biography: Mikko, a venerable competitor hailing from the esteemed Lakeside Golf Vammala, brings a wealth of experience to the greens of the Hector Trophée. A man of intriguing stories, Mikko is known to have planted his seeds in four different women across four decades, showing a zest for life that translates onto the golf course.

With an unwavering dedication to the sport, Mikko has graced the fairways of the Hector Trophée in 10 previous tournaments. As he prepares to tee off in Hector Trophée 2025, it marks his 11th appearance, a testament to his enduring passion for the game.

Though the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded his grasp thus far, Mikko's participation enriches the spirit of the competition. His fellow players know him as a fierce but fair competitor on the course and a true sportsman off the course.
